elementalSpark:AdaptAndStrike.NAME: Adapt and Strike
elementalSpark:AdaptAndStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL Gain !M! Damage when changing elements while in hand

elementalSpark:EarthShield.NAME: Earth Shield
elementalSpark:EarthShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL switches to elementalspark:Earth

elementalSpark:Ethereal.NAME: Ethereal
elementalSpark:Ethereal.DESCRIPTION: !M!% chance to dodge incoming attacks in every elements NL Prevent using Air for 4 turns

elementalSpark:FinalFlame.NAME: The Final Flame
elementalSpark:FinalFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL Exit element NL Prevent using elementalspark:Fire for 4 turns

elementalSpark:FireOfTheForge.NAME: Fire of the Forge
elementalSpark:FireOfTheForge.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a Random card in your hand when entering elementalspark:Fire

elementalSpark:FlowIn.NAME: Flow In
elementalSpark:FlowIn.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card from your draw pile NL switches to elementalspark:Water

elementalSpark:FlyLikeAButterfly.NAME: Fly like a Butterfly
elementalSpark:FlyLikeAButterfly.DESCRIPTION: 3% chance to dodge incoming attacks while in the elementalspark:Air element

elementalSpark:Harden.NAME: Harden
elementalSpark:Harden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL Convert current block to TempHP

elementalSpark:HeatWave.NAME: Heat wave
elementalSpark:HeatWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies NL switches to elementalspark:Fire

elementalSpark:LaminarFlow.NAME: Laminar Flow
elementalSpark:LaminarFlow.DESCRIPTION: Move all cards from the discard to the draw pile. NL Chose future draw order. NL Prevent using elementalspark:Water for 4 turns

elementalSpark:Levitate.NAME: Levitate
elementalSpark:Levitate.DESCRIPTION: Draw a random card from your discard pile NL switches to elementalspark:Air

elementalSpark:LightUp.NAME: Light up
elementalSpark:LightUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL switches to elementalspark:Fire

elementalSpark:Parasite.NAME: Parasite
elementalSpark:Parasite.DESCRIPTION: Steal an enemies block NL switches to elementalspark:Earth

elementalSpark:RockThrow.NAME: Rock throw
elementalSpark:RockThrow.DESCRIPTION: Destroy all Block and deal Damage equal to it's amount to all enemies (Deals !D! damage.)

elementalSpark:Splash.NAME: Splash
elementalSpark:Splash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL Draw from your discard pile when entering elementalspark:Water element

elementalSpark:StandingWater.NAME: Standing Water
elementalSpark:StandingWater.DESCRIPTION: Retain !M! card in your inventory if finishing the turn in the elementalspark:Water element.

elementalSpark:SuddenWind.NAME: Sudden Wind
elementalSpark:SuddenWind.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay NL Switch to elementalspark:Air, gain [W]
elementalSpark:SuddenWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Autoplay NL Switch to elementalspark:Air, gain [W] [W]

elementalSpark:ReactiveStrike.NAME: Reactive Strike
elementalSpark:ReactiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL If the enemy intend on attacking, switch to elementalspark:Earth. NL otherwise switch to elementalspark:Fire

elementalSpark:VolatileSpark.NAME: Volatile Spark
elementalSpark:VolatileSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Switch to an Element of your choice
